text: Allah yasezeranyije abemeye muri mwe bakanakora ibikorwa byiza ko rwose azabagira abazungura ku isi nk’uko yabigiriye abababanjirije. Kandi ko azubahisha idini ryabo yabahitiyemo (Isilamu). Ndetse ibihe bahozemo by’ubwoba azabisimbuza iby’umutekano (igihe cyose bazaba) bangaragira batambangikanya n’icyo ari cyo cyose. Ariko abazahakana nyuma y’ibyo, abo ni bo byigomeke
